Jacquie Lawson 2021 London Advent Calendar

Brief: Step into a world of festive delights with the Jacquie Lawson 2021 London Advent Calendar app. This digital calendar reinvents the traditional countdown to Christmas with a beautifully intricate main scene brimming with animations and interactive experiences. Designed to create an immersive holiday ambiance, the app reveals a charming new story or activity each day, leading up to and including Christmas Day itself.
